p: A logistic regression model predicting participant inquisitiveness (1 = would like more information, 0 = would not like more information) with total physical movement and total physical rotation as standardized predictors showed a significant effect of total physical movement [(β = 0.45, SE = 0.23); Wald = 3.90, p = 0.048, Exp(β) = 1.57; 95% CI for Exp(β) [1.00, 2.47], but no effect of total physical rotation [ p = 0.12, Exp(β) < 1; 95% CI for Exp(β) [0.44, 1.10], Nagelkerke R 2 = 0.03].
